pages.text: The $(item)Transposition Sigil$() allows players to store and transport a single block.$(br2)Block information is saved during this process, allowing players to transport chests, furnaces, or other complex devices.$(br2)To use, [$(k:sneak)] + [$(k:use)] an empty $(item)Transposition Sigil$() on the desired block to store
it, then [$(k:use)] the sigil again at the new location you wish to place the stored block.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() $(blood)1,000 LP$()/use
